gui.panels
Class PanelTextModules

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gui.panels.PanelTextModules
All Implemented Interfaces:
ListenerTextEditable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class PanelTextModules
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ListenerTextEditable

Class for the panel which contains the comboBoxes for the text modules.

Author:
Antje Huber
